name: HousekeeperManager
0:
”Alexa,open housekeeper manager”
”Alexa,ask housekeeper manager to open skype”
”Alexa,ask housekeeper manager to open picture”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: housekeeper manager
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is used to interact with Geniatech's STB. You can open the movie, music, picture, skype application on the device. When the device opens these applications, these applications will automatically play videos, music, and pictures on the machine . The skype app only supports opening. So if you want to use and control it means you need a device first. If there is no equipment, we do not recommend that you use this skill, because you can not see any actual effect.This skill is mainly for those who already have equipment.
